name: Fantasy Heroes - Revenge of The Dark Souls
name_original: Fantasy Heroes - Revenge of The Dark Souls
description:
The Time of Peace is Over!! The Dark Souls has broken The Sealed Rune and got away destroying everything. Heads UP!!

Destroy your enemies through Glorious dungeons and seal the Dark Souls Again and save the World.

Link : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.LittlePharaoh.FH
